input_args.text: "Earthquake hits Italy shaking Rome's ancient ruins 'including Colosseum and Pantheon' The tremor, which is believed to be 5.5 magnitude struck near Perugia but has reportedly caused some minor damage in the capital city Anonymous Coward Report Copyright Violation Re: Earthquake hits Italy shaking Rome's ancient ruins 'including Colosseum and Pantheon' When the antipope is installed, Rome will be destroyed by an Earthquake within 7 months. This is the beginning. Anonymous Coward ( OP )"
